entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing before morning. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
